AwardWeightedCriteria.title: Award weighted criteria
AwardWeightedCriteria.description: A weighted criterion as defined in eForms BG-707 and compatible with TED 2.0.9.

lotID.title: Award criterion lot identifiers
lotID.description: Identifiers of the lots or groups of lots to which this criterion applies.

awardCriteriaComplicated.title: Award criteria complicated
awardCriteriaComplicated.description: When the weighing cannot be explained per criterion, a mathematical equation or any other description can be used to explain the weighing of the criteria.

awardCriteriaOrderJustification.title: Award criteria order justification
awardCriteriaOrderJustification.description: Justification for only indicating the award criteria's order of importance, not their weighing.

awardWeightedCriteria.description: List of the criteria that applies to the selected lots or groups of lots
awardWeightedCriteria.title: Award weighted criteria

AwardWeightedCriterion.title: Award weighted criterion
AwardWeightedCriterion.description: An award criterion that applies to a lot or group of lots, and that has weighing information.

criterionType.title: Criterion type
criterionType.description: The aspect of the offer that is concerned by the criterion. It uses the open [awardCriteria](https://standard.open-contracting.org/1.1/en/schema/codelists/#award-criteria) codelist.

criterionNumber.title: Criterion number
criterionNumber.description: Number of the criterion and meaning of the number.

AwardWeightedCriterionNumber.title: Award criterion number
AwardWeightedCriterionNumber.description: The number that qualifies the weight of the criterion and its meaning.

number.title: Number
number.description: The number that qualifies the weight or priority of the criterion.

meaning.title: Meaning
meaning.description: The meaning of the number that qualifies the weight or priority of the criterion.

awardWeightedCriteriaPerLot.title: Award weighted criteria per lot
awardWeightedCriteriaPerLot.description: A list of weighted criteria as defined in eForms BG-707 and compatible with TED 2.0.9.
